column4: Greetings Everyone, i just installed (yesterday) Ubuntu 10.10 netbook remix and was wondering if there was a way to hide the side dock that is always present on the left?
not yet, 11.04 will have that feature
what are you using to chat on here?
then there should be a separate tab/window with me, depending how you configured it to look like
wait, what other options are there?
did you catch my pm btw?

yes i did but sorry about no reply, just bought this WD My Passport Elite 500GB and want to set it up as best i can, now it seems i have total of 750GB's of space, the Passport and the built in NetBook's 250GB :)
is that an option froom the disk utility?
when you select MBR, you can select Ext4, but don't since you might need to export it to windows
so leave it like it is :)
